name: Thief - Road to assassin
description:
Here's a free game to  entertain you for some minutes :D

A thief in an assassin's guild in order to become an assassin.

was my first game on Unity3D(one year ago), was trying out platformer's mechanics.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Im looking for pixel artists to work on another projet .

If you need any other information just leave a comment or send a mail at shadownt@live.com

Hope you enjoy
